ColorEye - Class in rover
The EV3 lego brick can be connected to a color sensor, here called ColorEye (because it kind of looks like a single eye).
ColorEye(Port) - Constructor for class rover.ColorEye
One can initialize a ColorEye by giving it a port.
compute_new_heading() - Method in class rover.Navigator
Computes a new location, assuming straight travel, from previous location, using tacho counts.

Computes a new location, assuming straight travel, from previous location, using tacho counts.

use combination of rotations and travels instead.
